Pre-Game Insights: Spencer Arrighetti has been great this month, with a 2.55 ERA in August, striking out 36, walking six, and opponents having a.193 batting average against him.
Taijuan Walker has struggled this season, especially lately, with a 9.26 ERA in August, allowing 16 hits in 11.2 innings, and walking seven batters.
The Phillies have taken the seventh most walks this season, so they do a great job staying patient at the plate, and Arrighetti has a 10.4 percent walk rate.
The Phillies are a much better team at home this season, with a record almost 20 games over.500 at Citizens Bank Ballpark.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game is on August 28, 2024, at 4:05 PM ET/1:05 PM PT, with the Astros visiting the Phillies at Citizens Bank Ballpark.
The game can be watched on Space City Home Network, NBC Sports Philadelphia, and streamed on fuboTV (Free Trial).
